the emotiv EPOC+

This project was made using the Emotiv EPOC+ EEG headset.

Some specs on it:

  • number of channels: 14
  • sampling rate: 128 or 256 Hz
  • resolution 14 bits with 1 LSB = 0.51Î¼V

but you can probably learn more about it from Emotiv themselves.
